author: Special Correspondent
title: Shelter homes in U.P. to control migration
description: Free food and lodging for workers
content:
After the orders of the Union Home Ministry, the district authorities of Ghaziabad and Gautam Budh Nagar have decided to establish shelter homes to control the exodus of migrant workers.
